data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Niu, Ze-Qing, Ascher, John S., Griswold, Terry, Zhu, Chao-Dong (2019): Revision of the bee genus Bathanthidium Mavromoustakis (Hymenoptera: Apoidea Megachilidae: Anthidiini) with description of a new species from China. Zootaxa 4657 (1): 97-116, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4657.1.3|67 occurrences
